name: Mumbai Heritage and Culture
description: Discover the rich heritage and vibrant culture of Mumbai through its historical sites and local experiences.
top_attraction: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus, Gateway of India, Kala Ghoda
activities: Cultural tours, Museum visits, Local cuisine tasting
day1_details: Arrive in Mumbai and enjoy a cultural evening with traditional music and dance performances.
day2_details: Join a guided heritage walk through South Mumbai, visiting key historical sites.
day3_details: Visit the Prince of Wales Museum and various art galleries in Kala Ghoda.
day4_details: Experience a culinary tour, tasting local dishes from popular eateries and street vendors.
day5_details: Take a ferry to Elephanta Island and explore the ancient caves and sculptures.
day6_details: Spend the day shopping at local markets for traditional crafts and souvenirs.
day7_details: Enjoy a relaxing day at the hotel or visit any missed attractions before your departure.

name: Mumbai Adventure
description: Dive into the adventurous side of Mumbai with thrilling activities and explorations.
top_attraction: Sanjay Gandhi National Park, Water Kingdom, Juhu Beach
activities: Trekking, Water rides, Beach sports, Wildlife spotting
day1_details: Arrive in Mumbai and relax at Juhu Beach, enjoying the evening ambiance.
day2_details: Explore the national park with trekking and wildlife spotting, including a visit to Kanheri Caves.
day3_details: Spend a fun-filled day at Water Kingdom, enjoying various water rides and activities.
day4_details: Participate in beach sports and games at Juhu Beach, followed by a beachside dinner.
day5_details: Visit Worli Village and engage in local activities, including traditional cooking classes.
day6_title: Local Markets and Street Food Tour
day6_details: Join a guided tour of local markets and experience Mumbai's famous street food.
day7_details: Enjoy a leisure day, shopping for souvenirs or relaxing at your hotel before departure.

name: Mumbai City Tour
description: Experience the heart of Mumbai with its iconic sights, delicious food, and rich culture.
top_attraction: Gateway of India, Marine Drive, Colaba Causeway, Bandra-Worli Sea Link
activities: Sightseeing, Shopping, Food tasting, Cultural experiences
local_dishes: Vada Pav, Bhel Puri, Pav Bhaji, Misal Pav
day1_details: Arrive in Mumbai and enjoy a welcome dinner at a local restaurant.
day2_title: Gateway of India and Elephanta Caves
day2_details: Visit the Gateway of India and take a ferry to the Elephanta Caves for a historical tour.
day3_details: Stroll along Marine Drive and relax at Chowpatty Beach while enjoying street food.
day4_details: Spend the day shopping at Colaba Causeway and visit nearby cafes for local snacks.
day5_details: Drive across the Bandra-Worli Sea Link and explore Bandra’s lively streets and cafes.
day6_details: Visit historical sites like Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus and the Prince of Wales Museum.
day7_details: Enjoy a leisure day with options for shopping or relaxing before your departure.

name: New York City Highlights
description: Discover the iconic landmarks and vibrant culture of New York City on this exciting tour.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to November
top_attraction: Statue of Liberty, Central Park, Times Square, Empire State Building
activities: Sightseeing, Shopping, Broadway shows, Cultural experiences
local_dishes: New York-style pizza, Bagels, Cheesecake, Hot dogs
day1_details: Arrive in New York City and spend the evening exploring the bright lights of Times Square.
day2_title: Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island
day2_details: Take a ferry to visit the Statue of Liberty and explore the history at Ellis Island.
day3_details: Enjoy a leisurely stroll in Central Park and visit the American Museum of Natural History.
day4_details: Experience the magic of Broadway with a show of your choice in the evening.
day5_details: Visit the Empire State Building for breathtaking views and pay your respects at the 9/11 Memorial.
day6_details: Walk across the iconic Brooklyn Bridge and explore the trendy DUMBO area.
day7_details: Spend your final day shopping or visiting any missed attractions before your departure.

name: New York City Adventure
description: Get ready for an action-packed week in the Big Apple, filled with thrilling experiences and iconic sights.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to November
top_attraction: Brooklyn Bridge, High Line Park, Coney Island
activities: Cycling, Shopping, Food tours, Exploring neighborhoods
local_dishes: Cheesecake, Dim Sum, Pizza, Food Trucks

day2_details: Cycle across the Brooklyn Bridge and explore Brooklyn Heights and Dumbo.
day3_details: Join a food tour in Queens to sample diverse international cuisines.
day4_details: Spend a day at Coney Island, enjoying rides, games, and the beach.
day5_details: Walk the High Line park and visit Chelsea Market for lunch and shopping.
day6_title: Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island
day6_details: Visit the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island to learn about immigration history.
day7_details: Enjoy a leisure day to revisit favorite spots or relax before departure.

name: New York Cultural Exploration
description: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage of New York City, exploring its museums, art, and history.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to November
top_attraction: Metropolitan Museum of Art, MoMA, Broadway
activities: Museum visits, Cultural performances, Art exhibitions
local_dishes: Street Food, Dim Sum, Pizza, Hot Dogs
day1_title: Arrival and Evening at Lincoln Center
day1_details: Arrive in New York City and enjoy an evening performance at Lincoln Center.
day2_details: Spend the day exploring the exhibits at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
day3_details: Visit the Museum of Modern Art and explore art galleries in Chelsea.
day4_details: Take a guided tour of cultural neighborhoods like Chinatown and Little Italy.
day5_details: Enjoy a Broadway show in the evening, experiencing the vibrant theater scene.
day6_details: Visit historical sites including the 9/11 Memorial and Wall Street.
day7_details: Spend your final day at leisure, visiting any missed attractions before departure.

name: Paris City Experience
description: Explore the romantic streets and iconic landmarks of Paris in this unforgettable tour.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October

day3_details: Spend the day exploring the iconic art collections at the Louvre Museum.
day4_details: Explore the artistic neighborhood of Montmartre and visit the Sacré-Cœur Basilica.
day5_details: Take a day trip to the Palace of Versailles and stroll through its magnificent gardens.
day6_details: Visit Notre-Dame Cathedral and wander through the charming Latin Quarter.
day7_details: Spend your last day shopping or visiting any missed attractions before departure.

name: Paris Culinary Adventure
description: Indulge your senses in Paris with a focus on the city’s renowned culinary scene.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October

activities: Cooking classes, Food tours, Market visits
day1_details: Arrive in Paris and attend a traditional French cooking class.
day2_details: Join a food tour in the Le Marais district to sample local delicacies.
day3_details: Take a day trip to Bordeaux for a wine tasting experience.
day4_details: Visit a local market to buy fresh ingredients, followed by a cooking session.
day5_details: Explore the world of French chocolate and pastries with a guided tour.
day6_details: Experience Parisian café culture and enjoy a fine dining experience.
day7_details: Enjoy your last day at leisure, revisiting favorite eateries before departure.

name: Paris Art and Culture Tour
description: Delve into the artistic and cultural heritage of Paris through its museums and historic sites.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October
top_attraction: Musée d'Orsay, Pompidou Center, Palais Garnier
activities: Art museum visits, Cultural performances, Historical explorations
day1_title: Arrival and Evening at Palais Garnier
day1_details: Arrive in Paris and enjoy a performance at the Palais Garnier opera house.
day2_details: Spend the day exploring the exquisite collections at the Musée d'Orsay.
day3_details: Discover contemporary art at the Pompidou Center.
day4_details: Take a day trip to Mont Saint-Michel, a stunning island commune.
day5_details: Explore the historic neighborhoods of Le Marais and Saint-Germain-des-Prés.
day6_details: Experience the Louvre Museum at night with fewer crowds.
day7_details: Enjoy your final day at leisure, visiting any missed attractions before departure.

name: African Safari Adventure
description: Embark on an unforgettable safari adventure through the heart of Africa, exploring diverse wildlife and breathtaking landscapes.
top_attraction: Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Crater, Maasai Mara
activities: Game drives, Guided tours, Cultural experiences
day1_details: Arrive in Arusha and enjoy a welcome dinner while briefing on the upcoming safari.
day2_details: Travel to Serengeti National Park and enjoy an afternoon game drive.
day3_details: Spend the entire day exploring the vast landscapes and wildlife of Serengeti.
day4_details: Visit the Ngorongoro Crater for a full day of game viewing in one of the world's natural wonders.
day5_details: Engage with the Maasai community and learn about their culture and traditions.
day6_details: Explore Lake Manyara National Park, famous for its diverse ecosystems and wildlife.
day7_details: Return to Arusha for departure, reflecting on an incredible safari experience.

name: Cape Town Coastal Tour
description: Experience the stunning beauty of Cape Town, from Table Mountain to the breathtaking coastlines.
top_attraction: Table Mountain, Cape of Good Hope, Robben Island
day1_details: Arrive in Cape Town and enjoy a welcome dinner with a view of Table Mountain.
day2_details: Hike up Table Mountain for stunning views of the city and coastline.
day3_details: Explore the Cape Peninsula, visiting the Cape of Good Hope and Boulders Beach.
day4_details: Take a day trip to Stellenbosch for wine tasting and vineyard tours.
day5_details: Visit Robben Island to learn about its history and Nelson Mandela's imprisonment.
day6_details: Relax at Camps Bay beach, enjoying the sun and local beachside cafes.
day7_details: Enjoy a leisurely day before your departure, shopping or visiting any last attractions.

name: Egyptian Heritage Tour
description: Discover the ancient wonders and rich history of Egypt, from the Pyramids to the Nile.
top_attraction: Pyramids of Giza, Luxor Temple, Nile River
day1_details: Arrive in Cairo and enjoy a welcome dinner with a view of the Pyramids.
day2_details: Visit the iconic Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx, learning about their history.
day3_details: Explore the Egyptian Museum, home to treasures from ancient Egypt, including Tutankhamun's artifacts.
day4_details: Fly to Luxor and visit the Karnak Temple complex and Luxor Temple.
day5_details: Visit the Valley of the Kings, exploring the tombs of ancient Pharaohs.
day6_details: Enjoy a relaxing cruise on the Nile, with stops at historic sites along the river.
day7_details: Return to Cairo for departure, reflecting on the rich history of Egypt.

name: Egyptian Adventure
description: Explore the majestic wonders of ancient Egypt, from the Pyramids of Giza to the vibrant streets of Cairo.
top_attraction: Pyramids of Giza, Luxor, Nile River
day1_details: Arrive in Cairo, enjoy a welcome dinner with traditional Egyptian music.
day2_details: Visit the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx, learning about ancient Egyptian history.
day3_details: Explore the Egyptian Museum, including King Tutankhamun's treasures.
day4_details: Fly to Luxor, visit Karnak Temple and Luxor Temple in the evening.
day5_details: Explore the Valley of the Kings and visit the tombs of famous pharaohs.
day6_details: Take a relaxing Nile River cruise, stopping at Edfu and Kom Ombo temples.
day7_details: Return to Cairo for your departure, reflecting on your Egyptian adventure.

name: Egyptian Heritage and Culture
description: Delve deep into Egypt's rich heritage and experience the local culture and hospitality.
top_attraction: Cairo, Luxor, Aswan
activities: Cultural experiences, Market visits, Culinary tours
day1_details: Arrive in Cairo, followed by a cultural dinner experience with local music.
day2_details: Explore historic Cairo, visiting local markets and trying authentic street food.
day3_details: Visit the iconic Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx, with a camel ride experience.
day4_details: Fly to Aswan, visiting the High Dam and the Philae Temple.
day5_details: Enjoy a traditional Felucca ride on the Nile, experiencing local life along the river.
day6_details: Participate in a cooking class, learning to prepare traditional Egyptian dishes.
day7_details: Fly back to Cairo for departure, cherishing your cultural experience.

name: Egyptian Oasis Tour
description: Discover the hidden oases of Egypt, experiencing nature and local culture.
top_attraction: Siwa Oasis, Bahariya Oasis, White Desert
activities: Nature excursions, Desert safaris, Cultural experiences
day1_details: Arrive in Cairo, with an overnight stay before traveling to Siwa Oasis.
day2_details: Drive to Siwa Oasis, exploring the local sights and visiting ancient ruins.
day3_details: Visit the Oracle Temple and relax in the natural springs of Siwa.
day4_details: Experience a desert safari, camping under the stars in the White Desert.
day5_details: Travel to Bahariya Oasis, visiting the Golden Mummies Museum.
day6_details: Enjoy sandboarding and a 4x4 safari in the desert.
day7_details: Travel back to Cairo for departure, with memories of the unique oases.

description: Experience the grandeur of Russia, exploring its historic cities, rich culture, and breathtaking architecture.
top_attraction: Red Square, Hermitage Museum, Peterhof Palace
day1_details: Arrive in Moscow and enjoy a welcome dinner in a traditional Russian restaurant.
day2_details: Explore Moscow's highlights including Red Square, the Kremlin, and St. Basil's Cathedral.
day3_details: Visit the Tretyakov Gallery and experience the famous Moscow Metro stations.
day4_details: Travel to St. Petersburg via high-speed train and enjoy an evening at leisure.
day5_details: Explore the world-renowned Hermitage Museum and its stunning art collections.
day6_details: Take a day trip to Peterhof Palace, known for its beautiful gardens and fountains.
day7_details: Depart from St. Petersburg, reflecting on the rich history and culture of Russia.

name: Golden Ring of Russia
description: Explore the ancient cities of the Golden Ring, showcasing Russia's rich history and architecture.

day1_details: Arrive in Moscow, with a welcome dinner featuring traditional Russian cuisine.
day2_details: Travel to Vladimir and Suzdal, exploring their ancient churches and architecture.
day3_details: Visit Kostroma, known for its historic buildings and the Ipatiev Monastery.
day4_details: Discover the UNESCO World Heritage sites of Yaroslavl, including the Volga embankment.
day5_details: Visit Rostov Veliky, exploring its ancient kremlin and the beautiful Lake Nero.
day6_details: Return to Moscow for a leisurely evening and farewell dinner.
day7_details: Depart from Moscow, cherishing the memories of your Golden Ring adventure.

day7_details: Depart from St. Petersburg, reflecting on your cultural journey through Russia.

day7_details: Take a day trip to the Great Barrier Reef for snorkeling and diving.

name: Cultural Japan Tour

day3_details: Travel to Busan, visit Haeundae Beach and Jagalchi Fish Market.
day4_details: Fly to Jeju Island, visit Hallasan National Park and scenic beaches.
day5_details: Visit traditional villages and try local Jeju dishes.
day6_details: Enjoy water sports or hiking along the coastal trails.
day7_details: Return to Seoul for final shopping and departure.

name: Barcelona Cultural Tour
description: Explore the rich culture and vibrant architecture of Barcelona.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October
top_attraction: Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, Gothic Quarter
day1_details: Arrive in Barcelona, enjoy a welcome dinner featuring tapas.
day2_details: Visit the iconic Sagrada Familia and explore the surrounding area.
day3_details: Stroll through Park Güell and enjoy its unique architecture and gardens.
day4_details: Explore the Gothic Quarter, visit the Barcelona Cathedral.
day5_details: Take a day trip to Montserrat to see the stunning monastery.
day6_details: Participate in a cooking class and learn to make traditional dishes.
day7_details: Enjoy some last-minute shopping before your departure.

name: Madrid and Toledo Tour
description: Discover the historical and cultural highlights of Madrid and Toledo.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November
top_attraction: Prado Museum, Royal Palace, Toledo
activities: Art exploration, Historical tours, Food tasting
day1_details: Arrive in Madrid, enjoy a welcome dinner at a local restaurant.
day2_details: Visit the famous Prado Museum and see masterpieces by Spanish artists.
day3_details: Explore the Royal Palace of Madrid and its beautiful gardens.
day4_details: Take a guided tour of the historic city of Toledo.
day5_details: Visit local markets and taste traditional Spanish cuisine.
day6_details: Experience a flamenco show in the heart of Madrid.
day7_details: Enjoy final moments in Madrid before your departure.

name: Andalusia Tour
description: Experience the beauty and culture of Andalusia.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October
top_attraction: Alhambra, Seville Cathedral, Mezquita of Córdoba
day1_details: Arrive in Seville, enjoy a welcome dinner with local specialties.
day2_details: Visit the Seville Cathedral and the stunning Alcázar.
day3_details: Travel to Granada to visit the iconic Alhambra.
day4_details: Visit Córdoba to see the Mezquita and historic old town.
day5_details: Experience flamenco dancing and traditional music.
day6_details: Participate in a local cooking class to learn about Andalusian cuisine.
day7_details: Enjoy last-minute sightseeing before your departure.

name: Buenos Aires City Tour
description: Experience the vibrant culture and life of Buenos Aires.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November
top_attraction: La Boca, Recoleta Cemetery, Tango Shows
day1_details: Arrive in Buenos Aires, enjoy a welcome dinner with traditional dishes.
day2_details: Visit La Boca, Plaza de Mayo, and Recoleta Cemetery.
day3_details: Participate in a tango lesson and enjoy a show in the evening.
day4_details: Take a boat trip to the Tigre Delta and explore its beauty.
day5_details: Visit the MALBA Museum and explore local art.
day6_details: Explore a local market and taste authentic Argentine food.
day7_details: Enjoy final moments in Buenos Aires before your departure.

name: Mendoza Wine Tour
description: Discover the wine region of Mendoza and enjoy exquisite tastings.
best_time_to_visit: March to April, September to November
top_attraction: Mendoza Vineyards, Aconcagua Mountain
day1_details: Arrive in Mendoza, enjoy a welcome dinner featuring local dishes.
day2_details: Visit several vineyards for wine tastings and tours.
day3_details: Enjoy a day of outdoor activities, such as hiking or horseback riding.
day4_details: Explore the town of Mendoza and visit local markets.
day5_details: Take a trip to Aconcagua Provincial Park for breathtaking views.
day6_details: Participate in a cooking class focusing on local cuisine.
day7_details: Enjoy last-minute exploration before your departure.

name: Patagonia Adventure Tour
description: Experience the natural wonders of Patagonia.
top_attraction: Los Glaciares National Park, Torres del Paine
day1_details: Arrive in El Calafate, enjoy a welcome dinner featuring local cuisine.
day2_details: Take a guided tour of the stunning Perito Moreno Glacier.
day3_details: Enjoy a day of hiking and exploring the breathtaking landscapes.
day4_details: Travel to Torres del Paine National Park and explore its beauty.
day5_details: Enjoy a day of wildlife watching in the national park.
day6_details: Learn about the local culture and traditions.
day7_details: Enjoy your final moments in Patagonia before departure.

name: Marrakech Cultural Tour
description: Explore the vibrant culture and history of Marrakech.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November
top_attraction: Jemaa el-Fnaa, Koutoubia Mosque, Majorelle Garden
day1_details: Arrive in Marrakech, enjoy a welcome dinner featuring local dishes.
day2_details: Visit the historic Medina, including the Koutoubia Mosque.
day3_details: Visit the beautiful Majorelle Garden and the Yves Saint Laurent Museum.
day4_details: Participate in a Moroccan cooking class to learn local recipes.
day5_title: Day Trip to the Atlas Mountains
day5_details: Take a day trip to the Atlas Mountains for stunning views and hiking.
day6_details: Experience relaxation at a traditional Moroccan hammam.
day7_details: Enjoy some last-minute shopping before your departure.

name: Casablanca and Rabat Tour
description: Discover the modern and historical highlights of Casablanca and Rabat.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November
top_attraction: Hassan II Mosque, Royal Palace, Kasbah of the Oudaias
activities: Sightseeing, Cultural experiences, Local cuisine tasting
day1_details: Arrive in Casablanca, enjoy a welcome dinner at a local restaurant.
day2_details: Visit the magnificent Hassan II Mosque, one of the largest in the world.
day3_details: Tour the modern architecture and vibrant markets of Casablanca.
day4_details: Head to Rabat, the capital city, and visit the Royal Palace.
day5_title: Visit the Kasbah of the Oudaias
day5_details: Explore the picturesque Kasbah of the Oudaias and its gardens.
day6_details: Visit the Mohammed VI Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art.
day7_details: Enjoy final moments in Casablanca before your departure.

name: Sahara Desert Adventure
description: Experience the beauty and culture of the Sahara Desert.
top_attraction: Merzouga Dunes, Erg Chebbi, Ait Benhaddou
activities: Camel trekking, Desert camping, Star gazing
day1_details: Arrive in Marrakech, enjoy a welcome dinner with local specialties.
day2_details: Drive through the Atlas Mountains to reach Merzouga.
day3_details: Experience a camel trek to the Erg Chebbi dunes.
day4_details: Spend a night in a desert camp, enjoy traditional music around the fire.
day5_details: Watch the sunrise over the dunes before heading back to Merzouga.
day6_details: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou.
day7_details: Return to Marrakech for final sightseeing before your departure.
